DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate absorption , metabolism excretion [ 14C ] PD 0332334 characterize plasma , fecal urinary radioactivity identify metabolite [ 14C ] PD 0332334 .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-label Study Investigate Absorption , Metabolism Excretion Radiolabeled PD 0332334 Six Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion eligible enrollment trial : 1 . Healthy male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . 2 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) approximately 18 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . 3 . Evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate subject ( legally acceptable representative ) inform pertinent aspect trial . 4 . Subjects willing able comply schedule confinement period , treatment plan , laboratory test , trial procedure . Subjects present follow included trial : 1 . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , orallergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . 2 . Subjects enrol previous radionucleotide study receive radiotherapy within 12 month prior screen total radioactivity would exceed acceptable dosimetry . 3 . Subjects whose occupation require exposure radiation monitoring radiation exposure .
